body: I don't know why people don't like it. it have a sweet vibe, not like in the anime which is all about drugs and let Airi be fucked by others until she's bored with Papa's shit.
Meh, Airi doesn't need bigger breasts....they were big enough in the hentai series, this is way over-the-top. Disappointing.

I've never seen oni chichi and I dont get why people dont like it. Sure its Loki which isnt great but oppai loli is just such a bizzare genre it's so outlandish the only way you could be offended by it is if the author (foolishly) states their age or grade. I give this a 8/10, speaking from this books as a stand alone. Seems like just some incest if it even tho I dont really like father/daughter

unusual a doujin of a hentai... really unusual

Fun fact, this doujin is based of a hentai where the dad brainwashes(and quite possibly even caused brain dabblige) his kids and one of their best friends using highly addicting drugs. "clap" "clap" "clap" there I gave you all the sauce for those who don't know.
It's on point, but it feels weird seeing Oni Chichi in doujin medium. 6/10
